013package org.apache.juneau.html;
014
015import static javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamConstants.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.html.HtmlTag.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
019
020import java.io.IOException;
021import java.lang.reflect.*;
022import java.nio.charset.*;
023import java.util.*;
024import java.util.function.*;
025
026import javax.xml.stream.*;
027
028import org.apache.juneau.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.html.annotation.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
033import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
034import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
035import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;

038/**
039 * ContextSession object that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link HtmlParser}.
040 *
041 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
042 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
043 * </ul>
044 *
045 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
046 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../index.html#jm.HtmlDetails">HTML Details</a>
047
048 * </ul>
049 */
050@SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
051public final class HtmlParserSession extends XmlParserSession {
052
053   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
054   // Static
055   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
056
057   private static final Set<String> whitespaceElements = set("br","bs","sp","ff");
058
059   /**
060    * Creates a new builder for this object.
061    *
062    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
063    * @return A new builder.
064    */
065   public static Builder create(HtmlParser ctx) {
066      return new Builder(ctx);
067   }
068
069   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
070   // Builder
071   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
072
073   /**
074    * Builder class.
075    */
076   @FluentSetters
077   public static class Builder extends XmlParserSession.Builder {
078
079      HtmlParser ctx;
080
081      /**
082       * Constructor
083       *
084       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
085       */
086      protected Builder(HtmlParser ctx) {
087         super(ctx);
088         this.ctx = ctx;
089      }
090
091      @Override
092      public HtmlParserSession build() {
093         return new HtmlParserSession(this);
094      }
095
096      // <FluentSetters>
097
098      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
099      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
100         super.apply(type, apply);
101         return this;
102      }
103
104      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
105      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
106         super.debug(value);
107         return this;
108      }
109
110      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
111      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
112         super.properties(value);
113         return this;
114      }
115
116      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
117      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
118         super.property(key, value);
119         return this;
120      }
121
122      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
123      public Builder unmodifiable() {
124         super.unmodifiable();
125         return this;
126      }
127
128      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
129      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
130         super.locale(value);
131         return this;
132      }
133
134      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
135      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
136         super.localeDefault(value);
137         return this;
138      }
139
140      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
141      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
142         super.mediaType(value);
143         return this;
144      }
145
146      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
147      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
148         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
149         return this;
150      }
151
152      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
153      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
154         super.timeZone(value);
155         return this;
156      }
157
158      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
159      public Builder timeZoneDefault(TimeZone value) {
160         super.timeZoneDefault(value);
161         return this;
162      }
163
164      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
165      public Builder javaMethod(Method value) {
166         super.javaMethod(value);
167         return this;
168      }
169
170      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
171      public Builder outer(Object value) {
172         super.outer(value);
173         return this;
174      }
175
176      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
177      public Builder schema(HttpPartSchema value) {
178         super.schema(value);
179         return this;
180      }
181
182      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
183      public Builder schemaDefault(HttpPartSchema value) {
184         super.schemaDefault(value);
185         return this;
186      }
187
188      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ReaderParserSession.Builder */
189      public Builder fileCharset(Charset value) {
190         super.fileCharset(value);
191         return this;
192      }
193
194      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ReaderParserSession.Builder */
195      public Builder streamCharset(Charset value) {
196         super.streamCharset(value);
197         return this;
198      }
199
200      // </FluentSetters>
201   }
202
203   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
204   // Instance
205   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
206
207   private final HtmlParser ctx;
208
209   /**
210    * Constructor.
211    *
212    * @param builder The builder for this object.
213    */
214   protected HtmlParserSession(Builder builder) {
215      super(builder);
216      ctx = builder.ctx;
217   }
218
219   @Override /* ParserSession */
220   protected <T> T doParse(ParserPipe pipe, ClassMeta<T> type) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException {
221      try {
222         return parseAnything(type, getXmlReader(pipe), getOuter(), true, null);
223      } catch (XMLStreamException e) {
224         throw new ParseException(e);
225      }
226   }
227
228   @Override /* ReaderParserSession */
229   protected <K,V> Map<K,V> doParseIntoMap(ParserPipe pipe, Map<K,V> m, Type keyType, Type valueType)
230         throws Exception {
231      return parseIntoMap(getXmlReader(pipe), m, (ClassMeta<K>)getClassMeta(keyType),
232         (ClassMeta<V>)getClassMeta(valueType), null);
233   }
234
235   @Override /* ReaderParserSession */
236   protected <E> Collection<E> doParseIntoCollection(ParserPipe pipe, Collection<E> c, Type elementType)
237         throws Exception {
238      return parseIntoCollection(getXmlReader(pipe), c, getClassMeta(elementType), null);
239   }
240
241   /*
242    * Reads anything starting at the current event.
243    * <p>
244    * Precondition:  Must be pointing at outer START_ELEMENT.
245    * Postcondition:  Pointing at outer END_ELEMENT.
246    */
247   private <T> T parseAnything(ClassMeta<T> eType, XmlReader r, Object outer, boolean isRoot, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
248
249      if (eType == null)
250         eType = (ClassMeta<T>)object();
251      ObjectSwap<T,Object> swap = (ObjectSwap<T,Object>)eType.getSwap(this);
252      BuilderSwap<T,Object> builder = (BuilderSwap<T,Object>)eType.getBuilderSwap(this);
253      ClassMeta<?> sType = null;
254      if (builder != null)
255         sType = builder.getBuilderClassMeta(this);
256      else if (swap != null)
257         sType = swap.getSwapClassMeta(this);
258      else
259         sType = eType;
260
261      if (sType.isOptional())
262         return (T)Utils.opt(parseAnything(eType.getElementType(), r, outer, isRoot, pMeta));
263
264      setCurrentClass(sType);
265
266      int event = r.getEventType();
267      if (event != START_ELEMENT)
268         throw new ParseException(this, "parseAnything must be called on outer start element.");
269
270      if (! isRoot)
271         event = r.next();
272      boolean isEmpty = (event == END_ELEMENT);
273
274      // Skip until we find a start element, end document, or non-empty text.
275      if (! isEmpty)
276         event = skipWs(r);
277
278      if (event == END_DOCUMENT)
279         throw new ParseException(this, "Unexpected end of stream in parseAnything for type ''{0}''", eType);
280
281      // Handle @Html(asXml=true) beans.
282      HtmlClassMeta hcm = getHtmlClassMeta(sType);
283      if (hcm.getFormat() == HtmlFormat.XML)
284         return super.parseAnything(eType, null, r, outer, false, pMeta);
285
286      Object o = null;
287
288      boolean isValid = true;
289      HtmlTag tag = (event == CHARACTERS ? null : HtmlTag.forString(r.getName().getLocalPart(), false));
290
291      // If it's not a known tag, then parse it as XML.
292      // Allows us to parse stuff like "<div/>" into HTML5 beans.
293      if (tag == null && event != CHARACTERS)
294         return super.parseAnything(eType, null, r, outer, false, pMeta);
295
296      if (tag == HTML)
297         tag = skipToData(r);
298
299      if (isEmpty) {
300         o = "";
301      } else if (tag == null || tag.isOneOf(BR,BS,FF,SP)) {
302         String text = parseText(r);
303         if (sType.isObject() || sType.isCharSequence())
304            o = text;
305         else if (sType.isChar())
306            o = parseCharacter(text);
307         else if (sType.isBoolean())
308            o = Boolean.parseBoolean(text);
309         else if (sType.isNumber())
310            o = parseNumber(text, (Class<? extends Number>)eType.getInnerClass());
311         else if (sType.canCreateNewInstanceFromString(outer))
312            o = sType.newInstanceFromString(outer, text);
313         else
314            isValid = false;
315
316      } else if (tag == STRING || (tag == A && pMeta != null && getHtmlBeanPropertyMeta(pMeta).getLink() != null)) {
317         String text = getElementText(r);
318         if (sType.isObject() || sType.isCharSequence())
319            o = text;
320         else if (sType.isChar())
321            o = parseCharacter(text);
322         else if (sType.canCreateNewInstanceFromString(outer))
323            o = sType.newInstanceFromString(outer, text);
324         else
325            isValid = false;
326         skipTag(r, tag == STRING ? xSTRING : xA);
327
328      } else if (tag == NUMBER) {
329         String text = getElementText(r);
330         if (sType.isObject())
331            o = parseNumber(text, Number.class);
332         else if (sType.isNumber())
333            o = parseNumber(text, (Class<? extends Number>)sType.getInnerClass());
334         else
335            isValid = false;
336         skipTag(r, xNUMBER);
337
338      } else if (tag == BOOLEAN) {
339         String text = getElementText(r);
340         if (sType.isObject() || sType.isBoolean())
341            o = Boolean.parseBoolean(text);
342         else
343            isValid = false;
344         skipTag(r, xBOOLEAN);
345
346      } else if (tag == P) {
347         String text = getElementText(r);
348         if (! "No Results".equals(text))
349            isValid = false;
350         skipTag(r, xP);
351
352      } else if (tag == NULL) {
353         skipTag(r, NULL);
354         skipTag(r, xNULL);
355
356      } else if (tag == A) {
357         o = parseAnchor(r, swap == null ? eType : null);
358         skipTag(r, xA);
359
360      } else if (tag == TABLE) {
361
362         String typeName = getAttribute(r, getBeanTypePropertyName(eType), "object");
363         ClassMeta cm = getClassMeta(typeName, pMeta, eType);
364
365         if (cm != null) {
366            sType = eType = cm;
367            typeName = sType.isCollectionOrArray() ? "array" : "object";
368         } else if (! "array".equals(typeName)) {
369            // Type name could be a subtype name.
370            typeName = sType.isCollectionOrArray() ? "array" : "object";
371         }
372
373         if (typeName.equals("object")) {
374            if (sType.isObject()) {
375               o = parseIntoMap(r, newGenericMap(sType), sType.getKeyType(), sType.getValueType(),
376                  pMeta);
377            } else if (sType.isMap()) {
378               o = parseIntoMap(r, (Map)(sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer) ? sType.newInstance(outer)
379                  : newGenericMap(sType)), sType.getKeyType(), sType.getValueType(), pMeta);
380            } else if (builder != null) {
381               BeanMap m = toBeanMap(builder.create(this, eType));
382               o = builder.build(this, parseIntoBean(r, m).getBean(), eType);
383            } else if (sType.canCreateNewBean(outer)) {
384               BeanMap m = newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass());
385               o = parseIntoBean(r, m).getBean();
386            } else if (sType.getProxyInvocationHandler() != null) {
387               BeanMap m = newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass());
388               o = parseIntoBean(r, m).getBean();
389            } else {
390               isValid = false;
391            }
392            skipTag(r, xTABLE);
393
394         } else if (typeName.equals("array")) {
395            if (sType.isObject())
396               o = parseTableIntoCollection(r, (Collection)new JsonList(this), sType, pMeta);
397            else if (sType.isCollection())
398               o = parseTableIntoCollection(r, (Collection)(sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer)
399                  ? sType.newInstance(outer) : new JsonList(this)), sType, pMeta);
400            else if (sType.isArray() || sType.isArgs()) {
401               ArrayList l = (ArrayList)parseTableIntoCollection(r, list(), sType, pMeta);
402               o = toArray(sType, l);
403            }
404            else
405               isValid = false;
406            skipTag(r, xTABLE);
407
408         } else {
409            isValid = false;
410         }
411
412      } else if (tag == UL) {
413         String typeName = getAttribute(r, getBeanTypePropertyName(eType), "array");
414         ClassMeta cm = getClassMeta(typeName, pMeta, eType);
415         if (cm != null)
416            sType = eType = cm;
417
418         if (sType.isObject())
419            o = parseIntoCollection(r, new JsonList(this), sType, pMeta);
420         else if (sType.isCollection() || sType.isObject())
421            o = parseIntoCollection(r, (Collection)(sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer)
422               ? sType.newInstance(outer) : new JsonList(this)), sType, pMeta);
423         else if (sType.isArray() || sType.isArgs())
424            o = toArray(sType, parseIntoCollection(r, list(), sType, pMeta));
425         else
426            isValid = false;
427         skipTag(r, xUL);
428
429      }
430
431      if (! isValid)
432         throw new ParseException(this, "Unexpected tag ''{0}'' for type ''{1}''", tag, eType);
433
434      if (swap != null && o != null)
435         o = unswap(swap, o, eType);
436
437      if (outer != null)
438         setParent(eType, o, outer);
439
440      skipWs(r);
441      return (T)o;
442   }
443
444   /*
445    * For parsing output from HtmlDocSerializer, this skips over the head, title, and links.
446    */
447   private HtmlTag skipToData(XmlReader r) throws ParseException, XMLStreamException {
448      while (true) {
449         int event = r.next();
450         if (event == START_ELEMENT && "div".equals(r.getLocalName()) && "data".equals(r.getAttributeValue(null, "id"))) {
451            r.nextTag();
452            event = r.getEventType();
453            boolean isEmpty = (event == END_ELEMENT);
454            // Skip until we find a start element, end document, or non-empty text.
455            if (! isEmpty)
456               event = skipWs(r);
457            if (event == END_DOCUMENT)
458               throw new ParseException(this, "Unexpected end of stream looking for data.");
459            return (event == CHARACTERS ? null : HtmlTag.forString(r.getName().getLocalPart(), false));
460         }
461      }
462   }
463
464   private static String getAttribute(XmlReader r, String name, String def) {
465      for (int i = 0; i < r.getAttributeCount(); i++)
466         if (r.getAttributeLocalName(i).equals(name))
467            return r.getAttributeValue(i);
468      return def;
469   }
470
471   /*
472    * Reads an anchor tag and converts it into a bean.
473    */
474   private <T> T parseAnchor(XmlReader r, ClassMeta<T> beanType)
475         throws IOException, ParseException, XMLStreamException {
476      String href = r.getAttributeValue(null, "href");
477      String name = getElementText(r);
478      if (beanType != null && beanType.hasAnnotation(HtmlLink.class)) {
479         Value<String> uriProperty = Value.empty(), nameProperty = Value.empty();
480         beanType.forEachAnnotation(HtmlLink.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.uriProperty()), x -> uriProperty.set(x.uriProperty()));
481         beanType.forEachAnnotation(HtmlLink.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.nameProperty()), x -> nameProperty.set(x.nameProperty()));
482         BeanMap<T> m = newBeanMap(beanType.getInnerClass());
483         m.put(uriProperty.orElse(""), href);
484         m.put(nameProperty.orElse(""), name);
485         return m.getBean();
486      }
487      return convertToType(href, beanType);
488   }
489
490   private static Map<String,String> getAttributes(XmlReader r) {
491      Map<String,String> m = new TreeMap<>() ;
492      for (int i = 0; i < r.getAttributeCount(); i++)
493         m.put(r.getAttributeLocalName(i), r.getAttributeValue(i));
494      return m;
495   }
496
497   /*
498    * Reads contents of <table> element.
499    * Precondition:  Must be pointing at <table> event.
500    * Postcondition:  Pointing at next START_ELEMENT or END_DOCUMENT event.
501    */
502   private <K,V> Map<K,V> parseIntoMap(XmlReader r, Map<K,V> m, ClassMeta<K> keyType,
503         ClassMeta<V> valueType, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
504      while (true) {
505         HtmlTag tag = nextTag(r, TR, xTABLE);
506         if (tag == xTABLE)
507            break;
508         tag = nextTag(r, TD, TH);
509         // Skip over the column headers.
510         if (tag == TH) {
511            skipTag(r);
512            r.nextTag();
513            skipTag(r);
514         } else {
515            K key = parseAnything(keyType, r, m, false, pMeta);
516            nextTag(r, TD);
517            V value = parseAnything(valueType, r, m, false, pMeta);
518            setName(valueType, value, key);
519            m.put(key, value);
520         }
521         tag = nextTag(r, xTD, xTR);
522         if (tag == xTD)
523            nextTag(r, xTR);
524      }
525
526      return m;
527   }
528
529   /*
530    * Reads contents of <ul> element.
531    * Precondition:  Must be pointing at event following <ul> event.
532    * Postcondition:  Pointing at next START_ELEMENT or END_DOCUMENT event.
533    */
534   private <E> Collection<E> parseIntoCollection(XmlReader r, Collection<E> l,
535         ClassMeta<?> type, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
536      int argIndex = 0;
537      while (true) {
538         HtmlTag tag = nextTag(r, LI, xUL, xLI);
539         if (tag == xLI)
540            tag = nextTag(r, LI, xUL, xLI);
541         if (tag == xUL)
542            break;
543         ClassMeta<?> elementType = type.isArgs() ? type.getArg(argIndex++) : type.getElementType();
544         l.add((E)parseAnything(elementType, r, l, false, pMeta));
545      }
546      return l;
547   }
548
549   /*
550    * Reads contents of <ul> element.
551    * Precondition:  Must be pointing at event following <ul> event.
552    * Postcondition:  Pointing at next START_ELEMENT or END_DOCUMENT event.
553    */
554   private <E> Collection<E> parseTableIntoCollection(XmlReader r, Collection<E> l,
555         ClassMeta<E> type, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
556
557      HtmlTag tag = nextTag(r, TR);
558      List<String> keys = list();
559      while (true) {
560         tag = nextTag(r, TH, xTR);
561         if (tag == xTR)
562            break;
563         keys.add(getElementText(r));
564      }
565
566      int argIndex = 0;
567
568      while (true) {
569         r.nextTag();
570         tag = HtmlTag.forEvent(this, r);
571         if (tag == xTABLE)
572            break;
573
574         ClassMeta elementType = null;
575         String beanType = getAttribute(r, getBeanTypePropertyName(type), null);
576         if (beanType != null)
577            elementType = getClassMeta(beanType, pMeta, null);
578         if (elementType == null)
579            elementType = type.isArgs() ? type.getArg(argIndex++) : type.getElementType();
580         if (elementType == null)
581            elementType = object();
582
583         BuilderSwap<E,Object> builder = elementType.getBuilderSwap(this);
584
585         if (builder != null || elementType.canCreateNewBean(l)) {
586            BeanMap m =
587               builder != null
588               ? toBeanMap(builder.create(this, elementType))
589               : newBeanMap(l, elementType.getInnerClass())
590            ;
591            for (String key : keys) {
592               tag = nextTag(r, xTD, TD, NULL);
593               if (tag == xTD)
594                  tag = nextTag(r, TD, NULL);
595               if (tag == NULL) {
596                  m = null;
597                  nextTag(r, xNULL);
598                  break;
599               }
600               BeanMapEntry e = m.getProperty(key);
601               if (e == null) {
602                  //onUnknownProperty(key, m, -1, -1);
603                  parseAnything(object(), r, l, false, null);
604               } else {
605                  BeanPropertyMeta bpm = e.getMeta();
606                  ClassMeta<?> cm = bpm.getClassMeta();
607                  Object value = parseAnything(cm, r, m.getBean(false), false, bpm);
608                  setName(cm, value, key);
609                  bpm.set(m, key, value);
610               }
611            }
612            l.add(
613               m == null
614               ? null
615               : builder != null
616                  ? builder.build(this, m.getBean(), elementType)
617                  : (E)m.getBean()
618            );
619         } else {
620            String c = getAttributes(r).get(getBeanTypePropertyName(type.getElementType()));
621            Map m = (Map)(elementType.isMap() && elementType.canCreateNewInstance(l) ? elementType.newInstance(l)
622               : newGenericMap(elementType));
623            for (String key : keys) {
624               tag = nextTag(r, TD, NULL);
625               if (tag == NULL) {
626                  m = null;
627                  nextTag(r, xNULL);
628                  break;
629               }
630               if (m != null) {
631                  ClassMeta<?> kt = elementType.getKeyType(), vt = elementType.getValueType();
632                  Object value = parseAnything(vt, r, l, false, pMeta);
633                  setName(vt, value, key);
634                  m.put(convertToType(key, kt), value);
635               }
636            }
637            if (m != null && c != null) {
638               JsonMap m2 = (m instanceof JsonMap ? (JsonMap)m : new JsonMap(m).session(this));
639               m2.put(getBeanTypePropertyName(type.getElementType()), c);
640               l.add((E)cast(m2, pMeta, elementType));
641            } else {
642               if (m instanceof JsonMap)
643                  l.add((E)convertToType(m, elementType));
644               else
645                  l.add((E)m);
646            }
647         }
648         nextTag(r, xTR);
649      }
650      return l;
651   }
652
653   /*
654    * Reads contents of <table> element.
655    * Precondition:  Must be pointing at event following <table> event.
656    * Postcondition:  Pointing at next START_ELEMENT or END_DOCUMENT event.
657    */
658   private <T> BeanMap<T> parseIntoBean(XmlReader r, BeanMap<T> m) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
659      while (true) {
660         HtmlTag tag = nextTag(r, TR, xTABLE);
661         if (tag == xTABLE)
662            break;
663         tag = nextTag(r, TD, TH);
664         // Skip over the column headers.
665         if (tag == TH) {
666            skipTag(r);
667            r.nextTag();
668            skipTag(r);
669         } else {
670            String key = getElementText(r);
671            nextTag(r, TD);
672            BeanPropertyMeta pMeta = m.getPropertyMeta(key);
673            if (pMeta == null) {
674               onUnknownProperty(key, m, parseAnything(object(), r, null, false, null));
675            } else {
676               ClassMeta<?> cm = pMeta.getClassMeta();
677               Object value = parseAnything(cm, r, m.getBean(false), false, pMeta);
678               setName(cm, value, key);
679               try {
680                  pMeta.set(m, key, value);
681               } catch (BeanRuntimeException e) {
682                  onBeanSetterException(pMeta, e);
683                  throw e;
684               }
685            }
686         }
687         HtmlTag t = nextTag(r, xTD, xTR);
688         if (t == xTD)
689            nextTag(r, xTR);
690      }
691      return m;
692   }
693
694   /*
695    * Reads the next tag.  Advances past anything that's not a start or end tag.  Throws an exception if
696    *    it's not one of the expected tags.
697    * Precondition:  Must be pointing before the event we want to parse.
698    * Postcondition:  Pointing at the tag just parsed.
699    */
700   private HtmlTag nextTag(XmlReader r, HtmlTag...expected) throws ParseException, XMLStreamException {
701      int et = r.next();
702
703      while (et != START_ELEMENT && et != END_ELEMENT && et != END_DOCUMENT)
704         et = r.next();
705
706      if (et == END_DOCUMENT)
707         throw new ParseException(this, "Unexpected end of document.");
708
709      HtmlTag tag = HtmlTag.forEvent(this, r);
710      if (expected.length == 0)
711         return tag;
712      for (HtmlTag t : expected)
713         if (t == tag)
714            return tag;
715
716      throw new ParseException(this, "Unexpected tag: ''{0}''.  Expected one of the following: {1}", tag, expected);
717   }
718
719   /*
720    * Skips over the current element and advances to the next element.
721    * <p>
722    * Precondition:  Pointing to opening tag.
723    * Postcondition:  Pointing to next opening tag.
724    *
725    * @param r The stream being read from.
726    * @throws XMLStreamException
727    */
728   private void skipTag(XmlReader r) throws ParseException, XMLStreamException {
729      int et = r.getEventType();
730
731      if (et != START_ELEMENT)
732         throw new ParseException(this,
733            "skipToNextTag() call on invalid event ''{0}''.  Must only be called on START_ELEMENT events.",
734            XmlUtils.toReadableEvent(r)
735         );
736
737      String n = r.getLocalName();
738
739      int depth = 0;
740      while (true) {
741         et = r.next();
742         if (et == START_ELEMENT) {
743            String n2 = r.getLocalName();
744               if (n.equals(n2))
745                  depth++;
746         } else if (et == END_ELEMENT) {
747            String n2 = r.getLocalName();
748            if (n.equals(n2))
749               depth--;
750            if (depth < 0)
751               return;
752         }
753      }
754   }
755
756   private void skipTag(XmlReader r, HtmlTag...expected) throws ParseException, XMLStreamException {
757      HtmlTag tag = HtmlTag.forEvent(this, r);
758      if (tag.isOneOf(expected))
759         r.next();
760      else
761         throw new ParseException(this,
762            "Unexpected tag: ''{0}''.  Expected one of the following: {1}",
763            tag, expected);
764   }
765
766   private static int skipWs(XmlReader r)  throws XMLStreamException {
767      int event = r.getEventType();
768      while (event != START_ELEMENT && event != END_ELEMENT && event != END_DOCUMENT && r.isWhiteSpace())
769         event = r.next();
770      return event;
771   }
772
773   /**
774    * Parses CHARACTERS data.
775    *
776    * <p>
777    * Precondition:  Pointing to event immediately following opening tag.
778    * Postcondition:  Pointing to closing tag.
779    *
780    * @param r The stream being read from.
781    * @return The parsed string.
782    * @throws XMLStreamException Thrown by underlying XML stream.
783    */
784   @Override /* XmlParserSession */
785   protected String parseText(XmlReader r) throws IOException, ParseException, XMLStreamException {
786
787      StringBuilder sb = getStringBuilder();
788
789      int et = r.getEventType();
790      if (et == END_ELEMENT)
791         return "";
792
793      int depth = 0;
794
795      String characters = null;
796
797      while (true) {
798         if (et == START_ELEMENT) {
799            if (characters != null) {
800               if (sb.length() == 0)
801                  characters = trimStart(characters);
802               sb.append(characters);
803               characters = null;
804            }
805            HtmlTag tag = HtmlTag.forEvent(this, r);
806            if (tag == BR) {
807               sb.append('\n');
808               r.nextTag();
809            } else if (tag == BS) {
810               sb.append('\b');
811               r.nextTag();
812            } else if (tag == SP) {
813               et = r.next();
814               if (et == CHARACTERS) {
815                  String s = r.getText();
816                  if (isNotEmpty(s)) {
817                     char c = r.getText().charAt(0);
818                     if (c == '\u2003')
819                        c = '\t';
820                     sb.append(c);
821                  }
822                  r.nextTag();
823               }
824            } else if (tag == FF) {
825               sb.append('\f');
826               r.nextTag();
827            } else if (tag.isOneOf(STRING, NUMBER, BOOLEAN)) {
828               et = r.next();
829               if (et == CHARACTERS) {
830                  sb.append(r.getText());
831                  r.nextTag();
832               }
833            } else {
834               sb.append('<').append(r.getLocalName());
835               for (int i = 0; i < r.getAttributeCount(); i++)
836                  sb.append(' ').append(r.getAttributeName(i)).append('=').append('\'').append(r.getAttributeValue(i)).append('\'');
837               sb.append('>');
838               depth++;
839            }
840         } else if (et == END_ELEMENT) {
841            if (characters != null) {
842               if (sb.length() == 0)
843                  characters = trimStart(characters);
844               if (depth == 0)
845                  characters = trimEnd(characters);
846               sb.append(characters);
847               characters = null;
848            }
849            if (depth == 0)
850               break;
851            sb.append('<').append(r.getLocalName()).append('>');
852            depth--;
853         } else if (et == CHARACTERS) {
854            characters = r.getText();
855         }
856         et = r.next();
857      }
858
859      String s = trim(sb.toString());
860      returnStringBuilder(sb);
861      return s;
862   }
863
864   /**
865    * Identical to {@link #parseText(XmlReader)} except assumes the current event is the opening tag.
866    *
867    * <p>
868    * Precondition:  Pointing to opening tag.
869    * Postcondition:  Pointing to closing tag.
870    *
871    * @param r The stream being read from.
872    * @return The parsed string.
873    * @throws XMLStreamException Thrown by underlying XML stream.
874    * @throws ParseException Malformed input encountered.
875    */
876   @Override /* XmlParserSession */
877   protected String getElementText(XmlReader r) throws IOException, XMLStreamException, ParseException {
878      r.next();
879      return parseText(r);
880   }
881
882   @Override /* XmlParserSession */
883   protected boolean isWhitespaceElement(XmlReader r) {
884      String s = r.getLocalName();
885      return whitespaceElements.contains(s);
886   }
887
888   @Override /* XmlParserSession */
889   protected String parseWhitespaceElement(XmlReader r) throws IOException, ParseException, XMLStreamException {
890
891      HtmlTag tag = HtmlTag.forEvent(this, r);
892      int et = r.next();
893      if (tag == BR) {
894         return "\n";
895      } else if (tag == BS) {
896         return "\b";
897      } else if (tag == FF) {
898         return "\f";
899      } else if (tag == SP) {
900         if (et == CHARACTERS) {
901            String s = r.getText();
902            if (s.charAt(0) == '\u2003')
903               s = "\t";
904            r.next();
905            return decodeString(s);
906         }
907         return "";
908      } else {
909         throw new ParseException(this, "Invalid tag found in parseWhitespaceElement(): ''{0}''", tag);
910      }
911   }
912
913   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
914   // Extended metadata
915   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
916
917   /**
918    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified class.
919    *
920    * @param cm The class to return the metadata on.
921    * @return The metadata.
922    */
923   protected HtmlClassMeta getHtmlClassMeta(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
924      return ctx.getHtmlClassMeta(cm);
925   }
926
927   /**
928    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified bean property.
929    *
930    * @param bpm The bean property to return the metadata on.
931    * @return The metadata.
932    */
933   protected HtmlBeanPropertyMeta getHtmlBeanPropertyMeta(BeanPropertyMeta bpm) {
934      return ctx.getHtmlBeanPropertyMeta(bpm);
935   }
936}
